scripts.build-runner:clean: fvm flutter packages pub run build_runner clean
scripts.build-runner:watch: fvm flutter packages pub run build_runner watch
scripts.build-runner:build: fvm flutter packages pub run build_runner build
scripts.build-runner:build:verbose: fvm flutter packages pub run build_runner build --verbose
scripts.build-runner:watch:conflict: fvm flutter packages pub run build_runner watch --delete-conflicting-outputs
scripts.build-runner:build:conflict: fvm flutter packages pub run build_runner build --delete-conflicting-outputs
scripts.build-runner:build:conflict:verbose: fvm flutter packages pub run build_runner build --delete-conflicting-outputs --verbose
scripts.run-analysis-unused-l10n: fvm flutter pub run dart_code_metrics:metrics check-unused-l10n -p Il8n lib
scripts.run-analysis-metric: fvm flutter pub run dart_code_metrics:metrics analyze lib --fatal-style --fatal-warnings --fatal-performance
